type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_config set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_config WHERE is_active = 1 AND type = #{type} ORDER BY order_by ASC
mapper.delete: update sys_config set is_active = 0 where is_active = 1 AND id = #{id}
